summary: Tough ex-con Corky and her lover Violet concoct a scheme to steal millions of stashed mob money and pin the blame on Violet's crooked boyfriend Caesar.
cast: Jennifer Tilly|Gina Gershon|Joe Pantoliano|John P. Ryan|Christopher Meloni|Richard C. Sarafian|Mary Mara|Susie Bright|Margaret Smith|Barry Kivel|Peter Spellos|Ivan Kane|Kevin Michael Richardson|Gene Borkan
keywords: lesbian|mafia|bound and gagged|finger cut off|stolen money
director: Directors: Lana Wachowski (as The Wachowski Brothers), Lilly Wachowski (as The Wachowski Brothers)
title: Lazos ardientes
